# Interface KnowledgeGetInput

Represents input parameters for retrieving knowledge

interface KnowledgeGetInput {  
eventHistory: [History](/classes/core_history.History);  
ids: string[];  
}

### ids

IDs of the knowledge collections (must start with 'knowledge/' prefix)
